text:
This problem applies generally for neural networks. There are many strategies that you
could use, but perhaps the simplest is simply to train multiple Ô¨Ånal models on all of the available
data and use them in an ensemble when making predictions, e.g. the prediction is the average
of 10-to-30 models.
